Html:
Has anyone implemented Layout direction for Efficient Sugiyama ? it's commented out in the parameters for the algorithm.

I would like to be able to lay out my graph with Efficient Sugiyama flowing from left to right (vs top to botton)

I've created a work item for this http://graphsharp.codeplex.com/workitem/8090 if that helps?
I have do such a change. But in my version I have to deactivate the elimination of the isolated vertices. Also there is a change, that there will be no calculation if "VisitedGraph" has no vertices.
